channel.title: project on Shubham Singh
channel.description: Recent content in project on Shubham Singh

item.title: DGTOnline (Freelance)
item.description: Introduction One of my freelance projects, DGTOnline is a platform for a Mumbai based competitive exam coaching center. The main purpose of this platform was to provide a simple and easy to use interface that could help the faculty at the institution to easily conduct test with more accuracy and more frequency. At the same time the platform would help students to get accustomed to web based testing portals for these competitive examinations.

item.title: Message Automation in Whatsapp (Freelance)
item.description: Introduction One of my freelance projects was at a coaching institute which needed to automate the process of sending daily timetables to their students. Up until this point, someone had to manually forward the daily schedule to students sometimes in a group and sometimes even individually to up to 150-200 students. Even students from the same class can have different classes each day due to remedial classes, reassessment examinations, etc.

item.title: Codechef Hackathon Submission: NoobCommender
item.description: Introduction Developed a Web app with Oauth2 based REST API of Codechef, a competitive programming website. The web app works as a recommendation engine that consumes the REST API and recommends new questions to the user according to their previously solved problems on the platform. Recommendation of new questions is done with the help of a K-means classifier which works as a tag-based recommendation model. The web app also uses an asynchronous task queue to update all the required user tokens and recommendation list for an user.
